system_manifest.primary_objective: Autonomous Enterprise Operations via Digital Chief of Staff and JIT UI Plates

semantic_catalog.description: JSON ontology mapping corporate entities and API vendors for AI context.

immutable_lineage_log.description: Append-only BigQuery table for tamper-proof logging of human and AI actions.

identity_engine.description: Probabilistic matching engine assigning universal IDs to fragmented entities.

document_intake_webhook.description: FastAPI endpoint routing unstructured uploads to Gemini for extraction.

ASTROLOGISTICS_LLC.domain: Fleet Operations, Rental Management, Commercial Transport

inventory_master.purpose: Current physical state and location of vehicles

google_drive_architecture.purpose: File hosting, strictly mapped via automated naming conventions

state_health.last_verified_action: Success: Probabilistic Identity Merge of Web Lead & Service Record.

active_constraints: C-OS Paradigm: The UI is a blank slate. The Chatbot orchestrates and mounts JIT Plates based on conversational intent.
Strict API Abstraction: The Frontend (React/Vite) MUST NEVER connect directly to BigQuery or APIs. It calls the Python CIL.
Data Gravity: All data must ultimately rest in Google Cloud (BigQuery/Storage).
Veblen Aesthetic: Deep Zinc (bg-zinc-950), stark white text, Porsche Red accents. High-end, stealth luxury design.
Conversational vs Operational Isolation: Strategic context lives in Vector Memory; transactional data lives in SQL.
